title: Gurumin: A Monstrous Adventure (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "setup_gurumin_a_monstrous_adventure_2.0.0.1.exe"
- Run "patch_gurumin_a_monstrous_adventure_2.0.1.2.exe"
- Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

Title: GURUMIN: A MONSTROUS ADVENTURE
Genre: Role-playing - Action - Fantasy
Works on: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10)
Languages: Audio and text: English
Modes: Single-player
Released: March 30, 2015
Size: 0.9 GB
Company: n Falcom Corporation / Mastiff
Rating:	ESRB Rating: Everyone 10+ (with Mild Fantasy Violence, Mild Suggestive Themes, Tobacco Reference)
Store page: http://www.gog.com/game/gurumin_a_monstrous_adventure

About:
Gurumin stars Parin, a strong-willed girl sent to live with her grandfather in a small mining town. Parin soon discovers an invisible monster village hidden behind her home. She is quickly drawn into a fight between the villageâ€™s friendly monster residents and the Phantoms, evil monsters, that want to destroy them. Learning of a weapon hidden underneath the village that she alone is fit to wield, Parin embarks on a quest to stop the Phantoms and make the world right.
An Action-RPG from leading Japanese developer Nihon Falcom and winner of a Silver medal from Famitsu
35+ hours of playtime, 90+ items, multipe endings, real time combat
An all-star cast including: Amber Hood (Lightning Returns: Final Fantasy XIII, Valkyria Chronicles II), Dee Bradley Baker (Gears of War, American Dad!, Adventure Time), Tara Strong (My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic, Teen Titans Go!, Metal Gear Solid V, Ninja Gaiden) and Justin Shenkarow (L.A. Noire, Hey Arnold)
1080P Resolution

Minimum system requirements - Windows: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10, Processor: Pentium III 800 MHz, Memory: 1 GB RAM, Graphics: 64 MB VRAM, 3D accelerator compatible with DirectX 9.0c, DirectX: 9.0c, Hard Drive: 1.3 GB HD space, Sound: Compatible with DirectX 9.0c

Recommended system requirements - Windows: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 (64-bit supported)bit, Processor: Pentium III 1.0 GHz or higher, Memory: 2 GB RAM, Graphics: 64 MB VRAM, 3D accelerator compatible w/ DirectX 9.0c, DirectX: 9.0c, Hard Drive: 1.3 GB HD space, Sound: Compatible with DirectX 9.0c
